tool_description:
Use to verify user social action
-Twitter: verify like a tweet, retweet, quote tweet, bio contains, name contains, tweet about something, pin tweet...
#twitter
name: Social action verifier
title: Social action verifier

api_list.name: ping
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://social-action-verifier.p.rapidapi.com/ping"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "social-action-verifier.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://social-action-verifier.p.rapidapi.com/ping"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "social-action-verifier.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
